title: The rule of faith, or, An answer to the treatises of Mr. I.S. entituled Sure-footing &c. by John Tillotson ... ; to which is adjoined A reply to Mr. I.S. his 3d appendix &c. by Edw. Stillingfleet.
author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
publisher: Printed by H.C. for O. Gellibrand ...,
notes: "A reply to Mr. J.S. his 3d appendix" has special t.p. with imprint dated 1675, and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
